parameters.Script: verifier.exe /standard /driver xdp.sys fnmp.sys fnlwf.sys ndis.sys ebpfcore.sys; return 0; <# Enable verifier on XDP-related drivers. Return zero to mask the verifier.exe exit code. #>
reg.exe add HKLM`\System`\CurrentControlSet`\Control`\CrashControl /v CrashDumpEnabled /d 1 /t REG_DWORD /f; <# Enable complete system crash dumps. #>
